name: Project Train
description:
Deal Massive Damage

Play Project Train, a retro inspired game with tonnes of blood and gore. 

Embark on the train of death and kill hundreds of demons.

Get a high score! Beat the developers!

Shurikens

The train is equipped with four shurikens. They will cut through a beast like butter and then bounce back like a boomerang.

Klaxon

Ready to let the devil know you're here? Sound the klaxon to give him a hint and bring his armies towards you.

Controls

WASD & Mouse - Move and Look

Left Shift - Increase Train Speed

Left Control - Decrease Train Speed

"E" or Left Mouse Button - Interact

"B" - Show the book

Music

Marcin Mazurek

Sasha Vilcinska

P.S

What does Project Train stand for? Yes, exactly. It was part of the plan all along.
